mapper.select: SELECT ch1.CHAT_HIS_NO, ch1.CATEGORY_NO, ch1.QUESTION, ch1.INSERT_USER_NO, ch1.INSERT_DATE FROM TCHATHIS ch1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT CHAT_HIS_NO, MAX(CHAT_HIS_SEQ) as MAX_SEQ FROM TCHATHIS WHERE INSERT_USER_NO = #{userNo} GROUP BY CHAT_HIS_NO ) ch2 ON ch1.CHAT_HIS_NO = ch2.CHAT_HIS_NO AND ch1.CHAT_HIS_SEQ = ch2.MAX_SEQ ORDER BY ch1.INSERT_DATE DESC
SELECT CHAT_HIS_NO, CHAT_HIS_SEQ, CATEGORY_NO, QUESTION, ANSWER, INSERT_USER_NO, INSERT_DATE FROM TCHATHIS WHERE CHAT_HIS_NO = #{chatHisNo} ORDER BY CHAT_HIS_SEQ
